server_received_time.description: The timestamp when the event data was received by the server

app.description: Information related to the application where the event originated

device_carrier.description: The mobile carrier used by the device

$schema.description: The schema version used for the event data

city.description: The city where the event occurred

user_id.description: The unique identifier for the user

uuid.description: The universally unique identifier for the event

event_time.description: The timestamp when the event occurred

platform.description: The platform where the event occurred (e.g., iOS, Android)

os_version.description: The version of the operating system on the user's device

amplitude_id.description: The unique identifier assigned by Amplitude for the event

processed_time.description: The timestamp when the event data was processed

user_creation_time.description: The timestamp when the user account was created

version_name.description: The name or label of the version associated with the event

ip_address.description: The IP address from which the event was triggered

paying.description: Flag indicating if the user is a paying customer

dma.description: The Designated Market Area where the event occurred

user_properties.description: Additional properties associated with the user

client_upload_time.description: The timestamp when the event data was uploaded from the client to the server

$insert_id.description: The unique identifier assigned by Amplitude for each event insertion

library.description: Information about the library/version used for event tracking

amplitude_attribution_ids.description: IDs that Amplitude uses for attributing conversions to various ad networks

device_type.description: The type of device (e.g., smartphone, tablet)

start_version.description: The version at which the user started using the application

location_lng.description: Longitude coordinate of the event location

server_upload_time.description: The timestamp when the event data was uploaded to the server

event_id.description: The unique identifier assigned to the event

location_lat.description: Latitude coordinate of the event location

os_name.description: The name of the operating system on the user's device

amplitude_event_type.description: The specific type of event tracked by Amplitude

device_brand.description: The brand of the user's device

groups.description: Groups to which the event belongs

event_properties.description: Additional properties associated with the event

data.description: Custom data associated with the event

device_id.description: The unique identifier assigned to the device

language.description: The language set on the user's device

country.description: The country where the event occurred

region.description: The region where the event occurred

is_attribution_event.description: Flag indicating if the event is an attribution event

adid.description: The advertising identifier associated with the user's device

session_id.description: The unique identifier for the user session

device_family.description: The family of the device model

sample_rate.description: The sampling rate used for the event data

idfa.description: The Identifier for Advertisers associated with the user's device

client_event_time.description: The timestamp when the event occurred on the client side

$insert_key.description: The key used for identifying the event insertion

data_type.description: The type of data associated with the event

plan.description: Information related to the user's plan

branch.description: The branch of the user's plan

source.description: The source of the user's plan

version.description: The version of the user's plan

source_id.description: The unique identifier for the event source

partner_id.description: The unique identifier for a partner associated with the event

global_user_properties.description: Global properties associated with the user
